name: @skywardapps/ts-united-types
description: Types and classes for tracking simple units (meters, seconds, acres, etc)
author: Skyward App Company, LLC

scripts.build: eslint src/**/*.{js,jsx,ts,tsx,json} && tsc --declaration --declarationMap --sourceMap && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs/generated src/index.ts
